title: Potrero top unit w/ panoramic view, yard, parking, w/d
posting_body: ['WALK-THROUGH VIDEO: <URL>', '*      Available August 1st', '*\t1,350 sqft, recently remodeled 2-level apartment, upper unit of 2-unit house in Potrero, one of the most coveted and sunniest neighborhoods in SF', '*\tPanoramic views on the West side (Bernal Heights, Noe Valley, Mission District, Twin Peaks, all the way to Golden Gate Bridge) and on the East side (Bay) - lots of light everywhere and amazing sunsets.', '*\t3 bedrooms / 2.5 Bathroom; Master Suite with walk-in closet, bathroom with shower and tub w/ jacuzzi jets; Hardwood floors or Carpet throughout; Unfurnished.', '*\tFull open kitchen with island and modern appliances (fridge, stove/oven, dishwasher).', 'Lots of cabinets and counter space', '*\tWasher and Dryer in unit, Storage room', '*\tDeck with view from Bernal Heights to Golden Gate Bridge with room for table or even a Peloton bike overlooking the view ;)', '*      Shared backyard (lot size is 2,500 sqft)', '*\t1 spot in shared garage with lots of storage space; Automatic door; Large driveway; Lots of street parking', '*\tCommute/public transportation:', '- 2 minutes from 280 and from 101 freeway entrances;', '- 10 Townsend bus across the street (SOMA / Downtown / Montgomery in 20 minutes);', '- 19 Polk and 48 Quintara/24thSt also 1 block away;', '- 22nd Caltrain station 16 min walking, 8 min by bike', '*\tWalking distance are parks, school (King Elementary School)', '*\tGroceries:  Neighborhood corner store 50 yards away; Several grocery stores walking distance (4 blocks); Safeway/Costco 5 minute drive away', '*\tPotrero Hill Recreation Centre w/ tennis courts and a sports playing field', '*\tNo cats, no dogs, no smoking', "If you're interested or have any questions, please send an email!"]
